rules_text: Gain control of up to one target noncreature permanent you don't control. Untap it.
special_text:
[+1]: Gain control of up to one target noncreature permanent you don't control until end of turn. Untap it.
[0]: Target player gains control of target permanent you control.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you target one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents.”
